metadata.title: CVE-2024-55639 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: renesas: rswitch: avoid use-after-put for a device tree nodeThe device tree node saved in the rswitch_device structure is used atseveral driver locations. So passing this node to of_node_put() afterthe first use is wrong.Move of_node_put() for this node to exit paths.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
